channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-8554] Add the SparkR document files to `.rat-excludes` for `./dev/check-license`
item.description:
> ./dev/check-license | grep -v boto

Could not find Apache license headers in the following files:
 !????? /Users/01004981/local/src/spark/myspark/R/lib/SparkR/INDEX
 !????? /Users/01004981/local/src/spark/myspark/R/lib/SparkR/help/AnIndex

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
